items.name: First Light Grapefruit West Coast IPA
items.desc: First Light is a grapefruit West Coast IPA with a hop bill delivering aromatic pine, orange, citrus and tropical fruit, supported by a crisp and dry malt base that leads to a refreshing bitterness.

items.name: Pintle Pale Ale
items.desc: Pintle is our core pale pale ale, brewed with wheat, oats and flaked barley in the grist for a smooth body; Whirlpooled & dry hopped with both Australian Cascade and Citra, its restrained bitterness and dry finish help maintain Pintle's all day crushability

items.name: Presale
items.desc:
We are packaging Pintle on 15/10/2020 (this Thursday!) and we're taking pre orders for mini kegs, shipping out the following Monday.
The kegs are being purged and counter pressure filled for maximum freshness. Keep it cold in your fridge and enjoy within 2 days of opening!

items.name: Solar Dawn Pale Ale
items.desc: Pale, vienna, munich, caragold & flaked oats make up the malt bill to give us plenty of body and enough sweetness for the ripe mango and bright citrus aromatics of Idaho 7, Chinook, Citra & Sultana

items.name: Solar Point Summer Pale
items.desc: Super Pale, Chit & Oats make up the grist, whirlpooled and dry hopped extensively with Meridian hops for their tropical & berry forward backbone with distinct citrus aromas.
